text: Itau is a centenary company

providing full banking
services for our customers.

When we started our cloud
journey back in 2018,

we needed a quicker
way to provide accounts

and allow the teams to
build on top of AWS.

After extensive studies, we
understood that with the services provided with AWS,

AWS organizations
and AWS Control Tower would

provide the
governance that we had internally

on the on-premise infrastructure,
we could replicate that within the cloud.
So we could have the security and

reliability that we had
in the on-premise environment
replicated that to the cloud.

We created secure pipelines
to provision accounts
and manage those accounts within AWS,
leveraging AWS CloudFormation

and also AWS Organizations
in Control Tower.
We leverage AWS Systems Manager
to create an automated runbooks

so the operations team
could execute changes
in the environment, production environment

without the need of our support
from the engineering teams,

but also internally we
could re-skill our team
through this journey.
So from 2018 to 2023,
we had more than 5,900 AWS certifications.

Since we started our
modernization journey, 2018,

we saw a decrease in 98%
in number of instance
that impacted our customers,

we increasing 13 times
the number of deployments
compared to 2018 with 2023,

and also we achieved
50% of the modernization
of most critical business services

that provide the best
experience to our customers.
